mapper.select: select * from examination_info where examination_id=#{examinationId} and is_deleted = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into examination_info(examination_paper_id, examination_name, created_by, start_time, end_time, limit_time, is_question_resort, is_option_resort) values(#{examinationPaperId},#{examinationName}, #{createdBy}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{limitTime}, #{isQuestionResort}, #{isOptionResort})
